name: Scrattch
tag_list: collaboration, productivity-software, digital-media, social-networking, workflow, big-data, developer-apis, social-bookmarking
overview:
More than one billion new pages are added to the Internet each day. In just 60 seconds more than 1500 blog posts, 600 YouTube videos and 6,600 Flickr photos are added to the already mounting repository of data available online. Lots of noise. How do you find the message? Scrattch alleviates this pain by enabling you to store and share your most important web findings in your own personal online library. We eliminate the noise and leave only the message.

Scrattch – Search. Store. Share is an online research, filing and sharing system designed to streamline the way internet users search, store and share the vast amount of information accessed each day across the internet.

The massive amounts of data we consume each day on the internet is hard to keep track of, URL’s get moved, sites get archived or deleted, important information is often lost in amongst the noise. Scrattch takes your most important Internet findings and simply catalogues every piece of data into your online personal library.

Scrattch lets users add their web findings to their own virtual library. Then share their favourites with others in the Scrattch community or keep their findings private. Scrattch also allows users to add their own unique content to their Scrattch library. Scrattch is about bringing people together in a social forum over common interests and not common friends.

Our Mission: To to create context and meaning around online data.
